title: jerry0
author: jerry0
content: Has anyone who ordered the nano ledger s plus recently tell me how long it took them to receive it?  I am considering ordering one.  I am in the US.  Can anyone who is in the US who bought a nano ledger plus tell me how many days did it take to receive their device?

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: jerry0 on October 09, 2022, 02:38:59 AMHas anyone who ordered the nano ledger s plus recently tell me how long it took them to receive it?  I am considering ordering one.  I am in the US.  Can anyone who is in the US who bought a nano ledger plus tell me how many days did it take to receive their device? Usually the delivery of the Ledger company's products takes no more than 2 weeks (according to information from their website). If you want to clarify the exact time of delivery of the parcel to your country, you can look at the link in the support section - https://support.ledger.com/hc/eu/article_attachments/4503870263069/FAQ_-_delivery_time.pdfFor US, express delivery will be 4-5 days, and economy shipping will be 1-2 weeks.In fact, all the information is available on the official website of Ledger in the support section - https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/sections/4404369938321-Orders-and-Shipping?support=true.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I searched Reddit and did not find any comments talking about delays or problems with shiping and receiving, so I assume that everything will happen smoothly and you will receive your device in less than two weeks maximum.
